scripts.start-test-db-container: docker rm mywi-test-db; docker run --name mywi-test-db -p 5600:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -d mywi/database
scripts.start-test: docker run -p=6666:3333 -e "NODE_ENV=test" --link mywi-test-db:mywi-test-db mywi/test node server/index.js
scripts.start-dev-db-container: docker rm mywi-dev-db; docker run --name mywi-dev-db -p 5500:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -v $PWD/_storage/etc:/etc/postgresql -v $PWD/_storage/log:/var/log/postgresql -v $PWD/_storage/data:/var/lib/postgresql -v $PWD/_storage/data/data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -d mywi/database
scripts.start-dev: docker run -p=5555:3333 -v $PWD/node_modules:/usr/mywi/node_modules -e "NODE_ENV=dev-docker" --link mywi-dev-db:mywi-dev-db mywi/dev node server/index.js
scripts.start-experimental-db-container: docker rm mywi-experimental-db; docker run --name mywi-experimental-db -p 5400:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -d mywi/database
scripts.start-experimental: docker run -d -p=4444:3333 -e "NODE_ENV=experimental" --link mywi-experimental-db:mywi-experimental-db mywi/experimental node server/index.js
scripts.start-stable-db-container: docker rm mywi-stable-db; docker run --name mywi-stable-db -p 5300:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -d mywi/database
scripts.start-stable: docker run -d -p=3333:3333 -e "NODE_ENV=stable" --link mywi-stable-db:mywi-stable-db mywi/stable node server/index.js
scripts.bundle: jsx node_modules/react-tabs-component/ client/components/external/ Tabs && browserify client/index.js -o client/browserify-bundle.js -d
